sys_ui_action.comments: If the request is in Draft status and was opened by the current user â€“ then if there is a well selected it will extract the well data for that well and set the following fields on the request from that well data (if more than one well was specified, then it will use the data from the first well that user selected): Current Well Status (From status), Area, Division, API, County, Foreman, Lease Operator (Pumper), Formation, Well Type
sys_ui_action.hint: This will populate in the form data from the specified well(s). If multiple wells are selected, first well will be used to pull data.
sys_ui_action.name: Populate Well Data
